search_default: Search in UAISEARCH or type a URL
your_search_dont_find_any_docs: Your search found no corresponding document
you_can_try_these_searches: You can also try to do these searches
failed_registration: This email has already been registered. Please try another one.
unexpected_error: An unknown mistake occurred. Please try again later!
success_delete: The whole history was successfully deleted!
warning_part_1: ATTENTION: This site is purely for study purposes
warning_part_2: This site is only for demonstration purposes.
in_title_description_1: Ensures that the word 'x' is present in the title.
in_title_description_2: Guarantees that the word 'x' is not in the title.
reading_time_1: Seeks content with reading time exactly at N minutes.
reading_time_2: Search content with reading time greater than n minutes.
reading_time_3: Search content with reading time less than n minutes.
reading_time_4: Search content with reading time between n and m minutes.
created_at_1: Seeks content created on date N. Attention: The format of the date must be exactly
created_at_2: Seeks content created after date N. Attention: The format of the date should be exactly
created_at_3: Seeks content created before date N. Attention: The format of the date should be exactly
created_at_4: Seeks content created between the date N and M. Attention: The format of the date should be exactly
search_tokens_description: You can refine your search using special operators. Here are some useful tips
search_tokens_final: Use these filters combined with free keywords to get more accurate results
exact_search_description: Use quotes to seek an exact phrase or term
exact_search_example: finds only results that contain exactly this expression
term_exclusion_description_2: before a word to delete results that contain it
term_exclusion_example: excludes results that mention the word
smart_search_description: You can combine normal terms with advanced filters
smart_search_example_3: Have more than 5 minutes of reading
tips_footer: Always try to start with simple terms and refine with filters if the results are too wide
wikipedia_description: Wikipedia is a free and collaborative online encyclopedia, created in 2001. It is maintained by the Wikimedia Foundation and written by volunteers around the world. Anyone with internet access can edit their articles. It is available in several languages ​​and covers a wide variety of subjects. Its content is based on reliable sources and verifiability policies. It is one of the largest and most accessed sources of information on the internet.
this_result_is_not_an_ad: This is a search result, not an ad. Only ads are paid and they are always identified with the "sponsored" or "ad" marker.
this_result_is_relevant_on: The result seems to be relevant to research in this country:
tips_how_to_search: Tips on how to do a search
